Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: bimonthly \bi*month"ly\, a. [Pref. bi- + monthly.] Occurring, done, or coming, once in two months; as, bimonthly visits; bimonthly publications. -- n. A bimonthly publication. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bimonthly \Bi*month"ly\, adv. Once in two months. [1913 Webster]

bimonthly adj 1: occurring twice a month; "a semimonthly publication" [syn: {semimonthly}] 2: occurring every two months; "bimonthly visits" [syn: {bimestrial}] n : a periodical that is published bimonthly adv 1: twice a month; "salaries are paid semimonthly" [syn: {semimonthly}] 2: every two months; "the bill was payable bimonthly"
